SilverSaber_Description: Plated with silver to deter rust.
GalaxySword_Description: It's unlike anything you've ever seen.
BoneSword_Description: A very light piece of sharpened bone.
TemplarsBlade_Description: It once belonged to an honorable knight.
LavaKatana_Description: A powerful blade forged in a pool of churning lava.
WoodenBlade_Description: Not bad for a piece of carved wood.
NeptunesGlaive_Description: An heirloom from beyond the Gem Sea.
BurglarsShank_Description: A weapon of choice for the swift and silent.
ShadowDagger_Description: When you hold the blade to your ear you can hear 1,000 souls shrieking.
ElfBlade_Description: Only the nimble hands of an elf could craft this.
CrystalDagger_Description: The blade is made of purified quartz.
WoodClub_Description: A solid piece of wood, crudely chiseled into a club shape.
AlexsBat_Description: The sweet spot is dented from Alex's famous Grand Slam.
WoodMallet_Description: The solid head packs a punch. Relatively light for a club.
TheSlammer_Description: An extremely heavy gavel that'll send foes flying.
GalaxyHammer_Description: It's made from an ultra-light material you've never seen before.
Femur_Description: An old, heavy bone caked in centuries of grime.
ElliottsPencil_Description: Elliott used this to write his book. It's sharp!
MarusWrench_Description: A big, metal wrench. It smells like Maru.
HarveysMallet_Description: It brings back memories of Harvey's clinic.
PennysFryer_Description: Laphi's favorite frying pan. There's some rubbery gunk stuck to the inside.
LeahsWhittler_Description: Mona's favorite tool for shaping driftwood.
HaleysIron_Description: It's searing hot and smells like Haley's hair.
PiratesSword_Description: It looks like a pirate owned this once.
WickedKris_Description: The blade is made of an iridium alloy.
Scythe_Description: It can cut grass into hay, if you've built a silo.
YetiTooth_Description: It's icy cold to the touch.
BrokenTrident_Description: It came from the sea, but it's still sharp.
TemperedBroadsword_Description: It looks like it could withstand anything.
GoldenScythe_Description: It's more powerful than a normal scythe.
DwarfSword_Description: It's ancient, but the blade never dulls.
DwarfHammer_Description: It emits a very faint whirring sound.
DwarfDagger_Description: It's ancient, but the blade never dulls.
DragontoothCutlass_Description: The blade was forged from a magical tooth.
DragontoothClub_Description: This club was crafted from a magical tooth.
DragontoothShiv_Description: The blade was forged from a magical tooth.
OssifiedBlade_Description: A large, sharp blade formed from bone.
IridiumNeedle_Description: The point is unbelievably sharp, even down to the atomic level.
InfinityBlade_Description: The true form of the Galaxy Sword.
InfinityGavel_Description: The true form of the Galaxy Hammer.
InfinityDagger_Description: The true form of the Galaxy Dagger.
Meowmere_Description: An unusual weapon from a far away land...
